Reviews.Title: Got ripped on this one
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: so excited the day I received my phone. right off not able to text had to take to ATT store, had to change a # that was still in phone. worked great for ONE week bought an awesome cover for it then totally DIED ON ME. back to ATT store & not able to help or explain why. bought new battery to try to save my purchase but NO GO. Now using my dad's old phone that has 3 letters on each key! SO BUMMED!! now I have to save $ all over again

Reviews.Title: Touch screen dead after 1 year
Reviews.Author: little ol' me
Reviews.Content: This phone is pretty much dead after only having it for a year. Once the touch screen goes, it's over. I can only answer an incoming call - that is all. I can't go through messages or save photos to my computer via bluetooth because I have to confirm all actions by using the touch screen that doesn't work. The keypad is good for messaging, but it would be more effective if I could scroll through screens using the arrows, especially when the touch screen no longer works. I've lost lots of photos on this phone. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Product does not Work!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these phones a week apart from the same dealer and neither phone works. Now I have to go through the hassle of paying to have it sent back plus gather allthis information that selected gadgets say they have to have in order to refund my money. I have bought things off amazon before and probably will again but it will not be from selected gadgets.

Reviews.Title: i like red
Reviews.Author: bcoe
Reviews.Content: when you get a tiem that is as good as stated. this was that item you wont be un happy

Reviews.Title: LG GR500 Xenon
Reviews.Author: Javi
Reviews.Content: I had a major problem with the screen. Like i read on other reviews my phone got a strange, red vertical line on the screen right in the middle. Besides that the phone works pretty well. Pretty slow with a 16GB micro SD

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone Too Many Errors!!
Reviews.Author: MLR
Reviews.Content: I loved the fact that this phone is red and it has a sliding keyboard with full touch screen. The price was great and I received the phone in a timely manner. The only problems were I could not get the phone to convert to my carrier for pic msg and the phone did freeze up a lot with the screen scrabbling at times. So I decided to send it back. I did receive a full refund so I would buy from the dealer again the phone had all I was looking for but had too many errors.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply Made
Reviews.Author: berrios
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my mom since she liked the slide screen and the ease of typing.  We received this product in the mail just fine.  When we put her sim card in the back of the phone the back piece would not snap in place this was frustrating.  We somehow got the back piece in place even though it was a super tight fit and taking it back off as now just as hard as trying to put it back on.  Then a week later I see the slider side of the phone was dangling from the keyboard piece of the phone, upon further inspection I saw that the slider hinges came off and were useless to the phone.  Now the phone is in two pieces and useless. Worst phone ever.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: lisa deoliveira
Reviews.Content: Nice phoe for the price.It arrived on time and have not had any problems with it yet,for the price it is very good quality

Reviews.Title: I like the phone
Reviews.Author: Michelle Howe
Reviews.Content: I like the phone, it works well for what I use it for, calling and texting only.  The only problem is the battery doesn't last as long as I think it should. Seems to be a consistent prob with this model

Reviews.Title: Basic ! but great !
Reviews.Author: Kevin Pena
Reviews.Content: great phone and its simplicity makes it really easy to use ! highly recommend this phone for anyone who is new to touch screen phones

Reviews.Title: lame wast of cash
Reviews.Author: General Lee
Reviews.Content: the screen died after one week of owning this phone. i only had a lame phone and thought this would be a great phone to have to talk to frends and text, but how can i do that when the screen dosn't work? i called the LG place for help and they were useless! they kept calling me mam and i'm a guy! the guy barly spoke english. pece of junk. don't buy it! it sucks!

Reviews.Title: lg xenon GR5oo
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I love my phone it is easy to use and I was able to get my ring tone on it

Reviews.Title: LG gr500 phone
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: My son loves the lg gr500 phone.  It is affordable and meets his needs. It is brand new and cheaper than having a contract with a cell phone company which charges $100 to replace a cell phone. It gets shipped quickly and is unlocked so all I have to do is get a new sim card from my cell phone company which is free.

Reviews.Title: Wrong phone and it didn't work
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I bought a phone that was advertised as a verizon phone.  I bought it for my daughter for Christmas but it got her today.  It had a big At&t; logo and it did't even work after charging tha battery for 8 hours.  A bunch of lies from this company.  Enough to make me never touch Amazon.com again.  You never know who you are dealing with.Chris

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: leddyam
Reviews.Content: It is good but not very easy to use. It has some complicated features and it is ok, but not great

Reviews.Title: Good mid-line cell, bad customer service
Reviews.Author: E. Estrada "Single Dad of 4"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my daughter, last November because her old cell phone was acting up.  It worked fine until mid-May and the touch screen stopped working.Sent e-mail through Amazon on May 14 to Masterdeals what was the way to get warranty service, its been one week and no reply.  Not an acknowledgement, nothing.What sets apart real customer service is how they treat the customer after the sale.  I will not be buying from Masterdeals again!

Reviews.Title: Screen went black after 3 months of light use...
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: We purchased this unlocked phone to use when we are out of the country.  However, after less than 3 months of light use the screen went black; therefore we could not make calls. However,we could still receive calls but couldn't see who was calling or use the text feature, and certainly could not access the contacts LIST to make calls; THEREFORE THE PHONE WENT UNUSED!  When we returned home after traveling for 6 months I contacted the seller by phone & email - NO RESPONSE!!! We are very disappointed with the phone, BUT MORESO WITH THE SELLER!!!  THIS IS NO WAY TO RUN A BUSINESS AND WE WILL CONTINUE TO SPREAD THE WORD ABOUT NOT PURCHASING ANYTHING FROM "Masterdeals"  LG Xenon GR500 RED Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 2MP Camera, GPS and Touch Screen

Reviews.Title: Did not last even two months!
Reviews.Author: naye
Reviews.Content: I thought the phone would be great, but I was very wrong about this assumption. I got the phone andd was disappointed. The screen was small and the navigaqtion was too complicated when it should be simple. It was annoying how the messages would pop up. It's supposedly a texting phone but the message box would be full within 70 messages. I had to delete messages constantly which just led to me to not text as much anymore. I also couldn't set any song as a ringtone anhd was stuck with very generic tones. The screen wasn't very sensitive and within two months it stopped responding. I had a very negative experience with this phone.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME phone
Reviews.Author: Lee Rogers
Reviews.Content: I have had my LG Xenon for about three years now and I LOVE it.  I have just about worn it out and I'm thinking of upgrading to the new LG Xpression, which is supposedly a newer version of the Xenon.  This phone has served me well.  I do not want to pay smartphone data plan prices and still want a good messaging phone and this one fits the bill.  I'm puzzled by the other reviews talking about screen freezes and such.  I have never had any such problem and we've actually owned two LG Xenons.  The other one got eaten by the gears in our recliner and ruined the screen.  Otherwise, it was just a great as the first.  Even with 2mp camera, I find that the photo quality tends to be pretty good.  However, it's best for taking pictures of things that don't move.  :)  Highly recommended.  GREAT phone.

Reviews.Title: I hate this phone
Reviews.Author: Shy
Reviews.Content: I hate this phone, I haven't been using it and have been trying to navigate it for two weeks.  It freezes up on me so often that I just give up!  Navigating the web is a waste of time.  Just typing in the web address is too much work because the screen moves around with any single touch then you have to find you spot again and it is not guaranteed to stay long enough for you to type it in.  Either that or you can't get a signal.  I have never had an issue with a signal where i live.  I would rather have an old flip phone than to keep this one.  I'm sending it back asap!

Reviews.Title: Good cell phone - that leaves much to be desired
Reviews.Author: S. Brogden "Manfred the wonder Dog"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. She uses SMS a lot and this phone rec'd great reviews on CNET as a texting phone. It is good for that. It is problematic in other areas. The phone has to be unlocked to turn off an alarm that is waking you up at 5 AM. We can find no way of adding a custom ring tone (without downloading it) as we've done on other phones. Even with the phone locked, my wife experiences many "butt dials". And the size is deceptively small - too small in our opinion.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: This is terrible dont waste your money on it its terrible! it works fine for a few days then all of a sudden it never works again.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Expedito Pinto de Paula Júnior
Reviews.Content: Good cell phone, works fine and have a lot of resources. But, is a simple cell phone. My doughter loved

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Marsha Swope
Reviews.Content: My 13 year old loves this phone. She says it is easy to use and the keyboard helps speed up texting.

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: mico8143
Reviews.Content: This phone replaced my wife's LG Neon.  Very similar, but this one has a touch screen, and square buttons on the keyboard.  She finds it pretty easy to use.

Reviews.Title: A Simple little phone
Reviews.Author: imsfan
Reviews.Content: Not much to say that hasn't already been said before. This phone is just a simple hold me over and that's it.

Reviews.Title: dont need a smart phone
Reviews.Author: taino
Reviews.Content: I gave the phone 4 stars because it doesn't have the security setting where u can put a password lock on certain applications. The camera is acceptional so overall its a good buy

Reviews.Title: Customer Review
Reviews.Author: Customer Rating
Reviews.Content: I liked this product when I saw it online because I liked the keyboard portion of it. Upon receipt, I really like it very much. The keyboard portion is good,and easy to navigate to other program menus. Great phone for folks not extremely high tech or gadget savvy. The internet portion of it doesn't work as great though because the screen is very small.Overall, it does what I need it to do, that is easy navigation, keyboard access for texting.Will recommend phone.

Reviews.Title: LG XENON GR500 IS A EASY TO USE CELL PHONE
Reviews.Author: Danny Swindell
Reviews.Content: I HAVE USED THE LG XENON GR500 OVER 2 YEARS.  HAVE NOT HAD A PROBLEM WITH IT.  CONSUMERS REPORTS RATED THIS CELL PHONE AS A "BEST BUY" OVER 2 YEARS AGO IS WHY I CHOSE THIS MODEL.  I HAVE USED A CELL PHONE SINCE 1994.  THIS IS THE VERY BEST I HAVE USED.  MY WIFE HAS IT ALSO IN A BLUE, I HAVE A RED COLOR.  BOUGHT 2 MORE A FEW WEEKS AGO JUST AS BACK UP SINCE THIS PHONE IS NOT BEING BUILT ANYMORE.  I WANT TO USE THIS MODEL AS LONG AS I CAN.  I CALL IT MY "WINCHESTER 73" MEANING IT IS A PERFECT PHONE.  I WISH THEY ALWAYS BUILT THIS MODEL, BUT THEY NEVER SEEM TO KNOW WHEN THEY HAVE A PERFECT PRODUCT. IT HAS CAPABILITY FAR BEYOND WHAT I USE IT FOR, BUT I AM HAPPY WITH WHAT I NEED IT TO TALK AND SOMETIMES TO TAKE A PICTURE.  THE SLIDEOUT KEYBOARD IS VERY HANDY TO ENTER NEW CONTACT DATA.

Reviews.Title: LG Xenon GR500 RED Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 2MP Camera, GPS and Touch Screen
Reviews.Author: Alice W. Crissy "acrissy"
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone with many of the latest features.  It does all the basic things you need to do- phone, internet, texting, etc.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: William T. Chromzack
Reviews.Content: For those like me where you mainly text and talk this phone is a great little soldier. I have not had the need to have a smart phone due to the other devices I own and as I said mainly a talk and text person. The Xenon has many smart phone feels such as the menu browser and the personalized screen with its "widget" like icons and sub menus. I don't have don't have many if any complaints. Looking to buy a second for a backup since I tend to be rough on phones. If any suggestions, I wish the QWERTY was more like the Neon II. I really like my wife's old one. The space bar position and spacing of the entire board made for reduced fat finger errors. But the Xeon QWERTY features more shortcuts and hot keys which eats up space. Not that it is tny it seems to have as much space and layout like all others in this category.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: alex.pip33
Reviews.Content: great producti like this product by make and attributes i chosse this cuz is the best for me .

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: clyde
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my son as a replacement. He enjoys the phone and it has with stood his punishment.

Reviews.Title: mom
Reviews.Author: mom
Reviews.Content: there is static in the ringing and texting. when i get a call or text, i hear it, but there is static. i am thinking about returning it. i just posted how good it was too! i am so disappointed.
